Class Answers

java.lang.Object
application.Answers
public class Answers extends Object
Manages answers for different questions in the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Answers

      public Answers(String user)
      Constructs an Answers object and initializes sample data.
      Parameters:
      user - The user initializing the answers (not currently used).

  • Method Details

    • addAnswer

      public Answer addAnswer(String questionID, String answer, String user)
      Adds an answer to a specific question.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question the answer belongs to.
      answer - The content of the answer.
      user - The user who posted the answer.
      Returns:
      The newly created Answer object.

    • removeAnswers

      public String removeAnswers(String question, String user)
      Removes all answers associated with a given question.
      Parameters:
      question - The ID of the question whose answers should be removed.
      user - The user requesting the removal.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success or failure of the removal.

    • getAnswers

      public List<Answer> getAnswers(String questionID)
      Retrieves all answers associated with a given question.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question.
      Returns:
      A list of answers for the question, or an empty list if no answers exist.

    • removeAnswer

      public String removeAnswer(String question, Answer answerToRemove, String user)
      Removes a specific answer from a given question if the user matches the answer's author.
      Parameters:
      question - The ID of the question containing the answer.
      answerToRemove - The answer to be removed.
      user - The user requesting the removal.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success or failure of the removal.
